name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Safelinks Skipper — Remove/Fix Outlook Safe Links

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically replaces Safe Links from Outlook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes/fixes the Safe Links feature from Microsoft Outlook — completely automatically! Has features for both desktop and online Outlook.

——— ONLINE OUTLOOK ———
● Automatically removes all Safe Links from emails
● Speeds up websites opened from email
● Stops Microsoft seeing websites you visit

——— DESKTOP OUTLOOK ———
● Automatically removes Safe Links in your browser, as soon as you click a link
● Speeds up websites opened from email
● Stops Microsoft seeing websites you visit




Please report any issues to the developer email below.

Source code is available at https://github.com/dantechguy/safelinks_skipper
